a.xlink:title: class for computation of a BeatHistogram from either a file or a vector
class for FFT computation with windowing
class for computation of a magnitude Novelty from either a file or a vector
class for audio normalization offering three options
class for computation of a Novelty from a block of data (e.g., time or magnitude spectrum)
class for single-pole low pass filtering
implement a circular buffer of type T
